channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenHarmony -- OpenHarmony

item.title: CVE-2024-36260|2024-07-02T13:48:04.106Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v4.0.0 and prior versions allow a remote attacker arbitrary code execution in pre-installed apps through out-of-bounds write.
